definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: These lunches, though, are where the pampering begins and ends.
sentences.chinese: 这些午餐，虽然，是纵容开始和结束的地方。
这是在塞尼特的第一个午餐。

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我实在太兴奋了，以至于我都没法吃午餐了。
让我们弌起吃顿午餐吧。

sentences.english: My husband can expense most of his lunches for work.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫会牺牲他大部分的午餐在工作上。

sentences.english: How about read Breakfast at Tiffanys at lunchtime?
sentences.chinese: 午餐时间读《蒂凡尼的早餐》也不错嘛。

sentences.english: Aiya, then what is afternoon meal?
sentences.chinese: 哎呀，那午餐有什么吃呀？

sentences.english: One free draft beer for purchasing draft beer at Lunch time in De Bistro .
sentences.chinese: 会员在西餐厅享用午餐时，买扎啤可免费赠送一杯。

sentences.english: After picnic the children begin to fly kites. Mr. and Mr. Jackson go fishing by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 午餐后孩子们开始放风筝，杰克逊夫妇在湖边钓鱼。

sentences.english: He is lunching me well at the Friday Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他在星期五饭店招待我吃丰盛的午餐。

sentences.english: That takes care of my lunch.
Then we relaxed and enjoyed our lunch to the sound of screeching sea birds and crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 然后自在地在海鸟尖声鸣叫和拍浪声中享用午餐。

sentences.english: Your child should not save seats in the lunchroom.
sentences.chinese: 孩子不可以在午餐室占座。

sentences.english: After the lunch, there will be an opportunity to enjoy fellowship by playing a game of soccer.
sentences.chinese: 午餐后将有机会打一场足球友谊比赛。

sentences.english: Today's vegetarian generations may frown upon canned luncheon meat.
sentences.chinese: 如今素食的一代人是不喜欢罐装的午餐肉的。

sentences.english: A hotdog when she came for lunch, Chinese if she stayed for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 午餐吃热狗，如果能呆到晚餐时间那就吃中餐。

definition: afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)
